item.description:
This event is based on an earlier one in the day being hosted by Paul, at http://www.meetup.com/SocialFun/events/81834562/

Paul was gracious enough to agree to have me host this in addition to his. There is lots to do in the afternoon, but the beer, food and festivities continue on through and past dinner time. This will give those who want to stay later, or can't get there until dusk, a chance to hang out and meet other Social Fun members as well. I'll send out more information in the next few days about where to gather, etc.

CBC's Annual Great Pumpkin Festival is always fun. They have over 40 different varieties of seasonal ales from all over New England on tap. In addition they will have the regular CBC favorites available.

The admission of $10 will get you a beer glass and some tickets for tasting. They also have food for sale.

For more information check

http://cambridgebrewing.com/events/details/the-2012-great-pumpkin-festival/
item.name: CBC Great Pumpkin Festival - 2nd Shift
